blog.description: Used to be Phanscuddles, then Itstooearlyfortiramisu and now mrandmrlesterhowell bc lets face it they really are married! been following phil since 2006 and dan since he first showed up in 2009, happy to answer any phan related questions, I have seen a lot of things over the years! post mainly phan things that make me happy :)

summary: Guys look... IT IS NOT OK TO POST STALKER PHOTOS OF DAN AND PHIL....EVER.   I don’t care if they are all over twitter or here or...
body:
Guys look… IT IS NOT OK TO POST STALKER PHOTOS OF DAN AND PHIL….EVER.   I don’t care if they are all over twitter or here or the front page of a newspaper.. It is never ok.   They are entitled to walk out the cinema without being stalked, entitled to go ANYWHERE without being stalked and photographed.

Its really not that hard to grasp.

blog.name: sartysarty
blog.title: SartySarty
blog.description: Fan of all things funny.  Phan fan.  Nerdfighter.  Science geek.  Cat fan.  Anxiety haver. Music lover.  Nap taker.  She/Her

title: Violet and Other Important Things
body:
Hi!  How are you?   I hope things are going great for you!

I’m hanging in there with Violet, who is also hanging in there.  We have one more prednisone pill and her appointment is not until Wednesday.  So, I am thinking of breaking it in half for tomorrow and Tuesday.  I don’t know what to do. She fell off the bed today and was like in shock.  It must have really hurt.  I held her for about 10 minutes, then put her down on the bed and she went to sleep.  Then I groomed her a bit and put her in the kitchen next to her food and water and she drank some and now is lying down sleeping next to the water bowl.  Whatever that indicates.  I love my baby and I hate to see her suffer.  I don’t feel hopeful about what the neurologist will have to say, but I am HOPING it is a tumor in her nose, not her brain.  I’m convinced it is a tumor.  I don’t know if the tumor caused the stroke or if it wasn’t a stroke after all.

Anyway, I heard Onision made a video about Dan.  I went to it and of course, comments are disabled.  I didn’t watch it because I know it is just for the views.  How pathetic.  I mean, make your own content.  Don’t diss other people just to get views.  

I loved Phils Q and A video!  It was so sweet and refreshing.  And can you imagine them buying a house and trying to renovate it together?  OMG.  How many trips to the Emergency Department would that have caused??

I miss Dan.  ™

Phil, as others have said, is carrying the Phandom on his shoulders and is doing a great job at it.  

But I still miss Dan ™. 

My new apartment is still great!  I have some boxes I need to take out, but other than that, it’s good.  

I’m down to 241.  From 260 lbs.  I’m kind of stuck there, but I know it will start going down again.  Getting stuck happens.  I would like to be 230 when I go to VidCon so I don’t have to worry about the seat belts fitting on the plane.  

I have a great student and this will be his last week. I’m always worried about getting students and then am sad when they leave.  

I wrote a guide for using our documentation and billing system and scheduling system at work and my supervisor approved my sending it out.  No one said anything to me about it, lol.  We’ll see how that goes over.

Well, I guess I’ll get ready to play HQTrvivia, which is not the same since Scott left, but is still fun.

To those of you who are watching GoT, may your favorite character survive the night!


Here is a pic of me and my Violet.  Good night, Sweetlings!

blog.name: ky-thewolf
blog.title: a junkyard of my mind
blog.description: Ky | 17 | they/them | bi/panromantic, grey-asexual | my fanfics: AO3 / Wattpad | Dan and Phil, Harry Potter, Riordanverse, Voltron, Merlin, FNaF and a whole lotta other bulshet

summary:
A year ago, adventures
Across the earth to be seen
By everyone watching
From the other side of the screen
Began with leg one
On...
body:
II anniversary

A year ago, adventures

Across the earth to be seen

By everyone watching

From the other side of the screen

Began with leg one

On an afternoon in Brighton

And at last the world could see it

At last they turned the light on.

Everyone had fun

All the energy of the cheers

Put smiles on the faces

Of ourselves and of our peers;

We felt breathless and delighted

Even after the curtain closed

We were all excited for the future

And for the rest of the shows.

We hoped we would all be able

To give them something back

To thank them for all they’ve given us

When our worlds were feeling black;

They gave us light

They gave us hope

They made us laugh

And helped us cope

And now the tour has been and gone

And we remember all the best

Times we’ve had and friends we’ve met

Now Dan and Phil can rest

Knowing they’ve made all our lives better

Simply by existing

And doing what they love to do

Because we’ll always be there listening.

Words can wear out

But their meanings remain

Held in our hearts

Like the shadows they have slain

Our broken alones

Became one with the herds

A community connected

By a love of two nerds.

this is my Interactive Introverts wristband; i have worn it every single day virtually 24/7 since i went to see the very first show, the Brighton matinee, a year ago today. as you can see, the word ‘introvert’ has all but worn away, but i still wear the wristband because after wearing it for so long i feel almost lost without it. in the same way, i would feel lost without Dan and Phil themselves and the amazing community of people i’ve met who love them and their content

in summary: @danielhowell and @amazingphil , ty ly bb - we look forward to the future xx

Times we’ve had and friends we’ve met

Now Dan and Phil can rest

Knowing they’ve made all our lives better

Simply by existing

And doing what they love to do

Because we’ll always be there listening.

Words can wear out

But their meanings remain

Held in our hearts

Like the shadows they have slain

Our broken alones

Became one with the herds

A community connected

By a love of two nerds.

this is my Interactive Introverts wristband; i have worn it every single day virtually 24/7 since i went to see the very first show, the Brighton matinee, a year ago today. as you can see, the word ‘introvert’ has all but worn away, but i still wear the wristband because after wearing it for so long i feel almost lost without it. in the same way, i would feel lost without Dan and Phil themselves and the amazing community of people i’ve met who love them and their content

in summary: @danielhowell and @amazingphil , ty ly bb - we look forward to the future xx
